title: Free sumoner name change
body:
I heard that there will be a fee sumoner name change at the ned of **Season 7**.
And i was wondering if that is true or not?

replies.body: I haven't heard anything like this being announced.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for any for accurate news and updates!
it is a lie, ofc you get many lp through your lotsystem and your runes, but that doesn't mean that it is free
